scalar:array.comment:
/** * Smarty wordwrap modifier plugin * * Type: modifier
* Name: wordwrap
* Purpose: wrap a string of text at a given length * * @link http://smarty.php.net/manual/en/language.modifier.wordwrap.php wordwrap (Smarty online manual) * @author Uwe Tews * @param array $params parameters * @return string with compiled code */
